biotools.summary: PRediction Informatics for Secondary Metabolomes. Prediction of genetically encoded natural product structures based on microbial genomes. It takes a microbial genome sequence as input, identifies biosynthetic gene clusters, and generates combinatorial libraries of structure predictions.

bioschemas.name: PRISM 3
bioschemas.summary: PRediction Informatics for Secondary Metabolomes. Prediction of genetically encoded natural product structures based on microbial genomes. It takes a microbial genome sequence as input, identifies biosynthetic gene clusters, and generates combinatorial libraries of structure predictions.
